definition: dam
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
dam/dike/embankment/CL:條|条[tiao2]
Three Gorges Dam on the Yangtze River
Zipingpu reservoir, Sichuan

sentences.english: Now the "angry river" is under a dual-threat from both soil erosion and a new dam project.
sentences.chinese: 怒江正面臨着水土流失和新建大壩的雙重威脅。

sentences.english: The flooding reignites one of the key debates over the construction of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 洪災重新引發了就建設三峽大壩的主要爭議之一。

sentences.english: When a dam is built, the accumulating water presses down upon the rock below.
sentences.chinese: 當大壩建成，逐漸積累的水壓壓向下方的岩石。

sentences.english: After the dam was completed, the undisturbed soil samples from the dam were non-dispersive by some experiments.
sentences.chinese: 大壩建成後的壩體原狀土樣屬於非分散性粘土。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is there, and is impossible to tear down.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩就在那裏，並且不可能拆毀。

sentences.english: The steel fiber concrete is used to strengthening the dam through more schemes comparison.
sentences.chinese: 經比選佛子嶺大壩加固採用鋼纖維混凝土新材料。

sentences.english: But he did, and the dam broke.
sentences.chinese: 但他讓了步，大壩決堤了。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhou, the reservoir management vice director, says the dam isn't responsible for the blooms.
sentences.chinese: 而周偉認爲，大壩並非導致水藻孳生的原因。

sentences.english: The Monticello Dam is located in Napa County, California, the United States.
sentences.chinese: 蒙蒂塞洛大壩位於美國加州納帕郡。

sentences.english: Analysis of Seepage and Measures of Seepage Control Strengthening for Right Abutment of Shitouhe Reservoir Dam.
sentences.chinese: 石頭河水庫大壩右壩肩滲漏分析及防滲加固措施。

sentences.english: Low water levels caused the country's largest hydropower dam to be shut down last month.
sentences.chinese: 上個月，低水位使得肯尼亞最大的水力大壩被迫關閉。

sentences.english: The dam backs up the water to prevent flood.
The silt-carrying water gushes out of three specialised holes in the dam.
sentences.chinese: 這些夾雜着泥沙的水流從大壩的三個孔中被排出。

sentences.english: As a sub-system, the system can be linked into a surveying system of dam.
sentences.chinese: 本系統可作爲子系統與整個大壩監測系統聯網。

sentences.english: The dam further imperils delicate fish populations in the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩也進一步威脅着長江瀕危魚類的種羣繁殖。

sentences.english: In their report, they explored the chance of building a dam on the river.
sentences.chinese: 在報告中，他們探討了在江上建造大壩的可行性。
